name: Inflate (Samuel Charlet)
description:
Sounds are coming soon!

Description : 

Inflate it's my new solo project! 

Challenge your friends in this intense and surprising mini-game.

Be careful not to put too much pressure on yourself or the balloon will explode!

It's 2 to 6 players.

2 Game modes :

- Score : 

You have to earn the maximum point without exploding the balloon. There is 5 turns. So if the balloon explode 5 times, the game is finished!

- Survie :

Your only goal : don't make explode the balloon or you'll lose. It's like a battle royal.

Thanks to Manuel Antonio and Yota for helping me during the project !

How to Play :

You just need to use your mouse to click on the buttons and follow the instructions!
